Author: msgbeepa
Title: Save and organize videos, clips and links from anywhere all in one place

Author: zkinion
Content: It doesn't seem like so bad of an idea.  A tad bit idealistic, and ignores the fact that we divide up and layer our society on purpose.  We shell ourselves up with people who we see as similar to ourselves, and shut out the rest.  Perhaps if there is a way they could apply some method of connecting "random" people based on a whole series of information such as interests/personality.

Author: agentbleu
Title: A new business model emerges that could save google video from some further legal threats
